Product: Debt collection
Consumer complaint narrative:
XX/XX/XXXX Convergent Outsourcing ( CO ) reported on my credit reports under their own name a balance due of {$1200.00} in violation of 209 CMR 18.17 ( 11 ) which clearly states a debt collector may not report under their own name on a MA resident report. 
XX/XX/XXXX I sent CO a XXXX Demand via certified mail informing them of their illegal reporting. I also included a validation of debt request as the original account was not mine and informed them of their failure to inform me of my rights. CO legally had 5 days to provide validation and 30 days to remove the listing from my record. 
XX/XX/XXXX CO failed to reply in anyway. I sent them a second notice 93A Demand via certified mail. 
XX/XX/XXXX CO removed their listing from my report and agreed to cease collections. 
XX/XX/XXXX CO sold this falsified claim for profit to a company called XXXX XXXX XXXX. I sent XXXX a 93A Demand informing them the account was fraudulent. They closed the account. 
XX/XX/XXXX CO took the account again and sold it again, for profit, to a company called XXXX XXXX XXXX. I sent XXXX  a 93A Demand - they agreed to cease collections. 
XX/XX/XXXX CO took the account and changed (! ) the account number claiming it was new. They reported the listing on my credit reports and continued to attempt to collect. 

XX/XX/XXXX I sent CO another 93A Demand again informing them of their illegal attempts to collect on a fraudulent account. They failed to reply in anyway. They failed to remove their listing from my reports. 

CO is in violations of all laws listed below : MA General laws : 209 CMR 18.17 ( 11 ) Unfair Practices, 940 CMR 7.07 ( 15 ) and ( 21 ) Deceptive Acts and Practices MGL Chapter 106 *CC 9-405 ( c ) Failure to furnish reasonable proof of assignment 940 CMR 7.08 Failure to provide validation of debt in required federal and state timeframe 940 CMR 7.08 ( 1 ) and ( 2 ) Failure to provide ANY validation of debt

I called on XXXX and inquired about the 90-day bonus payment and was informed I would have to wait until after XX/XX/XXXX, to see the promotion bonus deposited in my account. Customer service confirmed my promotion code at that time.

'' " Customer service acknowledged that she saw the record from XX/XX/XXXX and sees the promotion code from that conversation, " but it will not currently populate ''. Product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports

Please send me your verification method and original signed contract in 10 days. 
According to the Fair Credit Reporting Act, Section 609 ( a ) ( 1 ) ( A ), you are required by federal law to verify, through the physical verification of the original signed consumer contract, any and all accounts that you post on a credit report. Otherwise anyone paying for credit bureaus reporting services could fax, mail or email in a fraudulent account. 
Your failure to positively verify these accounts has hurt my ability to obtain credit. Under the FCRA, unverifiable accounts must be removed and if you are unable to provide me a copy of verifiable proof, you must remove the account.

Consumer complaint narrative: My vehicle was repossessed in XX/XX/XXXX. At that time I tried to pay the full past due balance to redeem my vehicle but Ally would not allow it. Mysteriously, all my monthly statements were going to the correct address but the only repossession notice sent, went to the address on my original loan application. Ally refused to allow me to redeem my vehicle without paying the entire loan in full, as evidenced in their response letter to the CFPB. On XX/XX/XXXX I wired them {$18000.00} which was rounded up, as they gave me {$18000.00} and some change. I called an hour before I wired the money to confirm with the redemption department as every time I called the figure kept changing. I redeemed my vehicle on XX/XX/XXXX. They XXXX XXXX me the title and said I had to sign it back over to them or re-register it again because my car was just about to be sold and the title was taken out of my name. They said as soon as my account closes out they would mail me the title and that it would take 45-60 days. Since then they have refused to give me my title and have claimed that I still owe them money and have been reporting negatively to the credit bureau. I called a few times trying to rectify the issue but everyone I speak with says there's a balance but can't explain why or how the amount changed in 1 hour from the time I called to the time the funds were wired. In XXXX and XX/XX/XXXX I tried calling to see if I could get this taken care of again but with no luck. In XX/XX/XXXX when I logged into my online account it said the Total Due was {$140.00}, the Total Payment Due was {$1000.00} and the Next Due was {$170.00} on XX/XX/XXXX. When I logged on inXX/XX/XXXX and requested a payoff figure it said I owed {$240.00}. I received a letter on XX/XX/XXXX stating I owe {$470.00}. Product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
Consumer complaint narrative:
Notice for Proof of Claim Account : ARS ACCOUNT RESOLUTION Service # XXXX To Whom it may Concern : This is a this complaint is submitted Under OHIO LAW U.C.C 1319.12 Taking assignment of debts States ( C ) No collection agency shall commence litigation for the collection of an assigned account, bill, or other evidence of indebtedness unless it has taken the assignment in accordance with all of the following requirements : Credit contracts are non-assignable even if the contract has a clause for assignability because it violates the contract Law. Where there is no fair valuable consideration given, the contract or agreement is void ab inito. The debt is non-transferable. If it is a contract for credit or goes to the character of the parties, it can not be transferred or assigned. No state can make a law impairing contracts, Under OHIO LAW U.C.C 1319.12 Taking assignment of debts ( 3 ) The assignment was manifested by a written agreement separate from and in addition to any document intended for the purpose of listing the account, bill, or other evidence of indebtedness with the collection agency. The written agreement shall state the effective date of the assignment and the consideration paid or given, if any, for the assignment and shall expressly authorize the collection agency to refer the assigned account, bill, or other evidence of indebtedness to an attorney admitted to the practice of law in this state for the commencement of litigation. The written agreement also shall disclose that the collection agency may consolidate, for purposes of filing an action, the assigned account, bill, or other evidence of indebtedness with those of other creditors against an individual debtor or co-debtors.

Dartmouth College v. Woodward 4 Wheat 518 : White v. Hart, 13 Id 646. Once the Creditor writes off a debt, it can not be assigned or Collected. Since this is an error I demand that you send me the following proofs. As you are obligated to do in accordance with the Fair Debt Collection Practice Act. Section 1692 ( g ) : Under the Law, FDCPA, Section 1692 ( g ), you have 30 days to supply these proofs, if more time is needed please contact me by certified mail and I will extend you 15 extra days. I also request to see a certified copy of any contract or agreement between you and the original creditor that gave you the right to collect this debt.

Product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
Consumer complaint narrative:
After my personal information was exposed in the data breach of the Washington XXXX XXXX XXXX, I contacted each of the XXXX credit bureaus to place a freeze on my credit, as was recommended. However, Experian has refused to place a freeze on my credit, instead demanding that I send them a giant pile of documents and photocopies in first class mail to Texas, and then wait XXXX weeks to see if they felt like complying. 

I have the legal right to freeze my credit, and they do not have the right to refuse that request. They are obligated to place a freeze as requested in a timely manner, and I dont have weeks to wait, as the fraudsters who stolen my information are not going to sit around waiting a few weeks before trying to steal my identity. 

I have tried repeatedly to contact them, but there is no way to reach them. I can only access a recording recapping the instructions to gather, photocopy, and mail to them all of my personal information and identification, a piece of mail confirming my name and current address, etc., and to check back in XXXX days.

Product: Debt collection
Consumer complaint narrative:
XXXX, XXXX SOC SEC # XXXX DOB XX/XX/XXXX ADDRESS XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, XXXX, FL XXXX ATTENTION DISPUTE DEPARTMENT TODAYS DATE : XX/XX/XXXX SHEFFIELD FINANCIAL CO XXXX Your company have violated FCRA 615 ( f ) ( 15 U.S.C. 1681m ( f ) ) ( f ) Prohibition on sale or transfer of debt caused by identity theft You have not responded to my request to provide me with an investigation report.

I need this resolve, under the Fair Credit Reporting Act, these disputed items may not appear on my credit report if they can not be supported by any evidence ( 1 ) In general No person ( company ) shall sell, transfer for consideration, or place for collection a debt that such person has been notified under section 1681c-2 of this title has resulted from identity theft.

( 2 ) Applicability The prohibitions of this subsection shall apply to all persons collecting a debt described in paragraph ( 1 ) after the date of a notification under paragraph ( 1 ). ( 3 ) Rule of construction Nothing in this subsection shall be construed to prohibit -- ( A ) The repurchase of a debt in any case in which the assignee of the debt requires such repurchase because the debt has resulted from identity theft ; ( B ) the securitization of a debt or the
pledging of a portfolio of debt as collateral in connection with a borrowing ; or ( C ) the transfer of debt as a result of a merger, acquisition, purchase and assumption transaction, or transfer of substantially all of the assets of an entity.

A person that furnishes information to any consumer reporting agency shall have in place reasonable procedures to respond to any notification that it receives from a consumer reporting agency under section 1681c-2 of this title relating to information resulting from identity theft, to prevent that person from refurnishing such blocked information.

The reference items are listed below please take this matter very serious SHEFFIELD FINANCIAL CO  XXXX I have report your company to consumerfinance.gov As a form of record and I am prepare to sue your company Example In re Portfolio Recovery Associates, LLC Telephone Consumer Protection Act Litigation, Case No. 11-MD-2295-JAH-BGS, in the U.S. District Court for the XXXX District of California Stop collection proceedings against me Signatures on applications and accounts Investigators report XXXX, XXXX SOC SEC # XXXX DOB XX/XX/XXXX ADDRESS XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, XXXX, FL XXXX

Product: Mortgage
Consumer complaint narrative:
I contacted CFPB in XX/XX/XXXX to report a problem with an escrow account that my mortgage lender created in error last year. The complaint number is # XXXX. 

That complaint was resolved by XX/XX/XXXX, when my mortgage lender closed the escrow account and reversed the payments that it had improperly debited from my mortgage payments to credit to the invalid escrow account. 

I recently received my form 1098 Mortgage Interest Statement for the XXXX tax year from my mortgage lender. On previous statements from previous tax years, Box 10 has been empty. On the statement for the XXXX tax year, Box 10 contains an amount -- {$810.00}. This amount is the same figure that factored into the escrow error that my lender made last year. 

I contacted my lender twice today ( XX/XX/XXXX ) and spoke to two separate customer service representatives to discuss the amount listed in Box 10 of the document, and to request a corrected XXXX Mortgage Interest Statement if the {$810.00} negatively impacts my tax filing. Neither representative seemed to fully understand the potential problems that this {$810.00} figure can cause and both stated that issuance of a corrected 1098 Mortgage Statements is not possible. Yet, the document itself clearly contains a box that the lender is required to check if a corrected document is issued and there is also verbiage on the back of the document informing the mortgagee how to proceed in the event that an error is identified. Neither representative knew how to assist me. 

My tax preparer stated that the {$810.00} figure that currently appears in Box 10 will reduce any tax refund that I may receive unless the XXXX statement is corrected. She also stated that this information on the form has been reported to IRS, so it must be corrected by the lender if it is incorrect. The escrow account was created by the lender in error, so the lender is obligated to correct its error, so that I am not further impacted or penalized by IRS.

Product: Mortgage
Consumer complaint narrative:
Thank you in advance for your attention in resolving unfair practices with Selected Portfolio Servicing. As of today XX/XX/2021, I have been denied a forbearance or a reasonable loan modification. SPS is not being helpful during the Covid 19 crisis. I asked for a forbearance and instead they offered a modification with a 3 month trial period. Not knowing what they were going to come back with till after a 3 month trial period. I was shocked to see the unreasonable & unheard proposed terms. It sounds like a major rip off. They have to stop ripping us off. I used to work in mortgage lending and currently a Notary Signing Agent and I do not see these types of terms they want us to agree to! 

This is a second loan. 
6 months unpaid mortgage payments equal to a total of {$3500.00} with fees which I still need to review but it is less then $ XXXX. XXXX Months of XXXX ) Modification trial periodXXXX Paid {$360.00} each month and on XXXXas well. 

Proposed Modification received XX/XX/2021 New payment {$360.00} which may adjust. 
New Maturity date XXXX, will add 14 years. Current Maturity date XXXX. 
Final ballon payment on the interest bearing principal balance of {$34000.00} is due on the XXXX Date. Yes XXXX XXXX, XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX. 
Amortization Term XXXX, XXXX XXXX XXXX, XXXX. Basically 40 years. 

We owe less than $ 5k and they want to charge over $ 50k. Includes the ballon payment and the difference in the new maturity date. Sounds like a rip off to me! 

We have no problem keeping the same monthly amount of {$580.00} & extending the term by 6 months or even 1 year like we did with our 1st mortgage with no problem. If they want to call it a Forbearance or a Modification it's ok. What's not ok, they tell us it is their investors choice. They don't disclose who the investor is and we have the right to know this as well. 

Hope you are able to help us and other upcoming customers with the same issue. I have been reading reviews on Yelp and XXXX  and they are being referred to CFPB. Thank you for your assistance. 

XXXX XXXX

Product: Credit card or prepaid card
Consumer complaint narrative: I use autopay for most of my bills to ensure they are paid on time. However, I use the paper statements, sent in the mail, to validate purchases and reconcile my bank accounts. Furthermore, I check my email infrequently so I never enroll in paperless statements with billers. When checking my email, I noticed the attached " Email 1 '' from Synchrony bank sent on XX/XX/XXXX informing me that my Amazon Store Card account will switch to paperless billing. Upon discovery of this email, I clicked the link to continue to receive paper statements. Now I'm keeping a much closer eye on my email in box and received the attached " Email 2 '' on XX/XX/XXXX announcing that my " statement delivery is about to change. Again, I clicked the link to continue to receive paper statements. I should not have to respond to weekly emails to continue to get my credit card statements mailed to me. I wonder how many Synchrony credit card holders were impacted and how many did not see a notice of this change. I believe it is also very likely that some people could potentially miss a payment and be subject to late fees and interest charges as a result of not getting their statement in the mail as they have become accustomed. I always thought that consumers had to agree to receive paperless statements but apparently sending statements in the mail has become a cost burden for a company that charges almost 26 % interest. This is ridiculous and should be illegal.

Product: Credit card or prepaid card
Consumer complaint narrative:
I applied for a car care credit card through Synchrony credit. I have spent the better part of the last year fixing my credit up to XXXX, so I really expected it to be accepted. 

However, I was completely shocked to see that I was declined. When I read the fine print a little further, it showed that my score was XXXX. My score hasn't been XXXX for years! And I pay good money to monitor my credit. 

After double-checking, they are, in fact, accessing a completely incorrect credit score. This is a problem because I would never have performed a hard pull unless I thought for sure I'd get approved. As previously stated, I'm rebuilding my credit and wouldn't want to lose even just a couple of points. 

I tried calling and got nothing but scratchy, pre-recorded prompts which ended because I wasn't approved and don't have an account number. There was an option to write them. But, realistically, is that really going to help me? There should be a way to get answers from a real person for something like this. 

I'm actually glad this happened because I would never trust this company to accurately report my payments if they can't even obtain an accurate report in the first place, but something needs to be done. 

Thank you!

Product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports

According to the FCRA these need to be deleted from my credit file. It is your duty to make sure accurate information is posted to my consumer report pursuant to Title 15 U.S.C 1681 2 ( b ) and Title 15 U.S.C 1681 e. If you feel as if the information I provide is inaccurate, presentment is in a form of Affidavit of Fact, so no material or misrepresentation has been completed .If you believe I obtained services I need a senior executive member of this company put on a affidavit, signed under penalty of perjury, signed and notarized. These inquires need removal from my consumer report because they never had written permission to pull my personal information. Only my current open credit cards should have permission to post.

Product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
Consumer complaint narrative:
Please be advised this is my THIRD WRITTEN REQUEST and FINAL WARNING that I fully intend to pursue litigation in accordance with the FCRA to enforce my rights and seek relief and recover all monetary damages that I may be entitled to under Section 616 and Section 617 regarding your continued willful and negligent noncompliance.

Despite two written requests, the unverified items listed below still remain on my credit report in violation of Federal Law. You are required under the FCRA to have a copy of the original creditors documentation on file to verify that this information is mine and is correct. In the results of your first investigation and subsequent reinvestigation, you stated in writing that you verified that these items are being reported correctly? Who verified these accounts? You have NOT provided me a copy of ANY original documentation ( a consumer contract with my signature on it ) as required under Section 609 ( a ) ( 1 ) ( A ) & Section 611 ( a ) ( 1 ) ( A ). Furthermore you have failed to provide the method of verification as required under Section 611 ( a ) ( 7 ). Please be advised that under Section 611 ( 5 ) ( A ) of the FCRA you are required to promptly DELETE all information which can not be verified.

The law is very clear as to the Civil liability and the remedy available to me ( Section 616 & 617 ) if you fail to comply with Federal Law. I am a litigious consumer and fully intend on pursuing litigation in this matter to enforce my rights under the FCRA.

I demand the following accounts be verified or deleted immediately.

Product: Checking or savings account
Consumer complaint narrative: I was in XXXX XXXX with friends on a trip in XXXX when my wallet and phone were stolen at a restaurant. After failing to find the stolen phone and wallet, I contacted SUNTRUST and reported my card stolen. At that time they went over several transactions that included ATM withdrawals. During this recorded line, I let them know what was my last transaction and all the fraud one. They made two cases - one for the ATM charges and the other for actual credit charges. At the same time I had to contact XXXX and try to get a new phone. I received a letter stating that both fraud charges were denied and contacted SUNTRUST to find out why. They refused to give us information and stated that we could only do an appeal. They sent us the form needed and I filled it out. In the appeal, I showed proof of requesting new phones, money transfers that my wife sent to my friends since I had no way of getting cash since my bank account was emptied. After 45 days - where we called several times and were told that no information could be given - we received a second denial. There was no explanation, no documentation of the investigation to back up the decision. We recorded this phone call because of all the false information the bank kept giving us. We were finally sent to a supervisor who stated that there was nothing else we can do. After an appeal is denied there is no futher procedure to fight for injustice. There is no proof of the investigation and the supervisor could not give us a reason for the denial. We recorded the supervisor informing us the the decision is given to a specialist and once they decide SUNTRUST will not do anything else. My identity was stolen, my bank account was emptied ( over {$1000.00} ) - my bank history shows I have never taken out more than XXXX cash ever at one time - EVER since I opened the account but they refused to find 5 transactions of XXXX at an atm unsuspicious! At a time where we need funds and shouldn't be playing around with a family 's finances, SUNTRUST literally told me they would do nothing. I'm considering getting an attorney because this is UNFAIR and ILLEGAL!

Product: Debt collection
Consumer complaint narrative:
Dear Sir/maam Subject : complaint about unlawful collection activity of a credit card, & collection agency. 
Being a dentist, I had no source of income for months ( 6 ) last yr, due to covid mandatory shutdown. 
but XXXX XXXX kept calling, emailing me for monthly dues.all credit card cos were required to offer a deferral programme.but this is the only credit card, that did not even have a deferral programme. they only waived late fees for 2 months, and kept charging me even late fees?? 
I talked to them couple of times, once the agent said, its ok if I cant pay, they will stop the collection for a period of time. But they never did that, only kept adding late fees, and sending me monthly bills, month after month.shockingly, they were mean enough to call me all the time, even on my home phone, and disturb sleep of seniors at home! 
Due to their lack of total sensitivity, I stopped even trying to talk to them.whereas, all other credit cards cos, have been humane, and offered my deferment plans.and I am paying them all on time now. 
I do know, that all credit cards cos were supposed to offer deferment plans, to those effected by lockdown, and total loss of income.but, XXXX XXXX had no such plan?? 
I am also head of household, so any effect on my credit score adversely effects the whole family.its not even my fault. 
my office was closed again since XXXX XXXX, due to very high covid cases in this county. 
i am trying to take baby steps to re-open, but not much business.it will take few months to even get business back to where i can afford to pay essential bills. 
dont forget, i have to file taxes too. 
all the late fees added so many times ( aleast 6 times ) need to be removed. 
i can only think of paying sometime next yr, in 2022, not this yr. 
Finally, XXXX XXXX was quick to transfer my acc to a collection agency.i just can not can not afford to pay this years sir. Have soo many urgent bills like electricity, food, gas, rent,,, to pay first. 
I have seniors at home too. 
I have no choice to file a complaint about this ongoing harassment. 
Thanks XXXX XXXX XXXX credit # XXXX

Product: Debt collection
Consumer complaint narrative:
I moved from XXXX, North Carolina to XXXX, Texas on XX/XX/XXXX, however my lease wasn't set to end until XX/XX/XXXX. Prior to moving, I contacted XXXX XXXX and scheduled to end my service on XX/XX/XXXX as well as provided them my new address.

I believed my account from XXXX to be settled and did not know of the {$130.00} ( the XXXX from XXXX and the partial from XX/XX/XXXX - XX/XX/XXXX ) that was still pending as unpaid on my account. 

In XXXX of XXXX, I went to get pre-approved for my first home mortgage loan and was made aware of a subpar credit score on XX/XX/XXXX. On XX/XX/XXXX, I was told by the lender that I had a collections charged to my credit score in XX/XX/XXXX by a company called Helvey & Associates. I had to ask who Helvey was as I had never heard of them and were told they were trying to collect {$130.00} from me after buying the debt from XXXX XXXX. 

This was the first time I was hearing of this unpaid account balance. No letters from XXXX XXXX, calls from XXXX XXXX, letters from Helvey, or calls from Helvey were ever received or this charge would have been paid immediately. 

I called Helvey and was told there was nothing they can do but I could pay XXXX and appeal. I immediately called XXXX XXXX, paid the balance, and was told they would notify Helvey. I am now being told that despite the lack of communication concerning this charge by both XXXX and Helvey, and the fact I paid immediately upon learning of it, nothing can be done to delete it from my credit report and help to repair my credit. 

I have a long-standing history of on-time payments, including credit card bills, rent payments, car payments, and payments to XXXX XXXX themselves.

According to the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act, codified as 15 USC 1692, you and all credit agencies, XXXX transunion, XXXX XXXX XXXX, etc. as a Debt Collector are required by federal law to verify with the physical original written and signed consumer contract on recording, related to the account you are attempting to collect on. Product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
Consumer complaint narrative:
I am writing to notify you of the violation of my rights under Federal law. Understand that if these accounts are not removed from my report immediately, I will take legal action against you as my right under federal law.

Under 15 USC 1681 ( a ) congress defines a consumer report as the term consumer report means any written, oral, or other communication of any information by a consumer reporting agency bearing on a consumers credit worthiness, credit standing, credit capacity, character, general reputation, personal characteristics, or mode of living which is used or expected to be used or collected in whole or in part for the purpose of serving as a factor in establishing the consumers eligibility for..

Understand that by this law, Transunion is included because you provide this consumer report and you are a consumer reporting agency! Under 15 USC 1681 ( 2 ), it also mentions exclusions pertaining to consumer reporting. I am quoting directly from congress so understand that your reporting is a federal violation based on laws put in place by congress.

15 USC 1681 ( 2 ) i excludes the reporting of report containing information solely as to transactions or experiences between the consumer and the person making the report. 
The term person means any individual, partnership, corporation, trust, estate, cooperative, association, government or governmental subdivision or agency, or other entity. 
All of the companies listed below are CORPORATIONS as defined by congress as a person Therefore the transactions between the consumer ( me ) and these corporations should not be on my consumer report under FEDERAL LAW! You are in direct breach of the federal laws put in place to protect the consumer.

Product: Credit card or prepaid card
Consumer complaint narrative: Over the past couple of months my business ( fleet ) credit card for gas purchases has fallen victim to a number of fraudulent charges that have posted to our account. The fraud protection system that the card uses flagged these as potential fraud and emailed me to confirm or deny the charges. In every instance I have responded that the charges were not authorized, and the card company blocked the compromised cards and issued a new one. When I received my statement I noticed that we were still charged for the fraudulent charges despite reporting that they were not authorized. I called the credit card provider earlier in XX/XX/XXXX and was told that even though we already reported the charges as fraudulent that we still had to submit a transaction dispute after the fact. I submitted disputes for 4 charges on XX/XX/XXXX and 2 more on XX/XX/XXXX. For each of those disputes I received notices back a week later stating that we will not be credited back for those charges because we have more than 10 cards. Today I have submitted disputes for 3 more charges and I have 3 more to dispute, but the card provider 's website seems to be down. I expect that the responses will be the same as those I have already received. Since the beginning of XXXX we have flagged {$1300.00} in fraudulent charges that the card provider has not credit back to us. Product: Checking or savings account
Consumer complaint narrative:
Citibank reduces next day Institutional Transfers to ones External Accounts from XXXX to XXXX XXXX XXXX REDUCTION!! 


Dear Consumer Financial Protection Bureau, I just found out that Citibank has reduced their next day Inter Institutional Transfers to ones External Accounts have been lowered from XXXX  to XXXX} until further notice. That is a XXXX XXXX REDUCTION! This just happened recently and I believe it is due to the whole XXXX shorting saga. What this policy can do is put the individual investor behind the 8-ball because they may need to move their money into their brokerage accounts to cover their trades. Citibanks standard service takes 3-5 days that is longer than the 2-day settlement date one is given to settle their stock trades. I also ask you, What good is being able to transfer only XXXX  a day? 

These are the messages that is posted once you sign into your Citibank account : - Effective immediately, as a security measure to protect Citibank accounts, the limits for next day Inter Institutional Transfers to your External Accounts have been lowered to XXXX until further notice. You can continue using the standard service to transfer to your External Accounts for amounts greater than XXXX 


When taking to a Citibank representative, these were their responses : - We never intent to upset our customers however it is applied to secure the fraud transactions.. 

- It is to protect Citibank accounts from a heightened risk of fraud, I am sorry for any inconvenience this has caused to you - It was initially XXXX using next day service now it was lowered to XXXX whereas standard transfer is still same with limit of XXXX - As an enhanced security measure and to protect Citibank accounts from a heightened risk of fraud, the limits for next day Inter Institution Transfers were lowered. You are still able to send IIT 's with a higher amount using the standard service. 

- However this change was made to all our customers however you can still transfer through standard transfer type for XXXX per day and monthly limit is XXXX I think that this seems like something to look into.

Product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
Consumer complaint narrative:
DEAR Transunion : Thank you for sending me your internal records of the debt ( XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX Account # XXXX, ( XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX ) Account XXXX and XXXX XXXX XXXX ) Account # XXXX, however you did not VALIDATE THE DEBT. YOU DID NOT provide me a copy of ANY original documentation ( a consumer contract with my wet-ink signature on it ) or provide a valid E-Signature stating my " Session '', " Time-Stamp '', " Browser '' and " IP Address '', with the proper paper trail as required under Section 609 ( a ) ( 1 ) ( A ) & Section 611 ( a ) ( 1 ) ( A ) I also have provided FACTUAL EVIDENCE ( see screenshots attached ). You deleted this debt on XX/XX/2021 and 7 days later this debt back to my Transunion credit report. You stated by mail that you verified that these items are being reported correctly so how could this happen? I am certain you are aware that it is against the law to threaten suit without the intention of doing so. Therefore, be advised that I am very serious about filing a suit against your company. I HAVE PROVIDED ONCE AGAIN FOR THE 2ND TIME : MY UTILITY BILL FOR ADDRESS VERIFICATION, ID AND SOCIAL SECURITY #, POLICE REPORT, ID AFFIDAVIT via UNITED STATES POSTAL OFFICE CERTIFIED MAIL TRACKING # : XXXX mailed on XX/XX/2021 and delivered and signature by Transunion on XX/XX/2021. 
I was informed on XX/XX/2021 that the item was deleted from my credit report. Now I have discovered that the item has been reinserted on my credit report. 

In accordance with the requirements of the FCRA section 611 ( a ) ( 5 ) ( B ) ( ii ), you are required to notify me of the reinsertion in writing within 5 business days.

( B ) Requirements relating to reinsertion of previously deleted material ( ii ) Notice to consumer If any information that has been deleted from a consumers file pursuant to subparagraph ( A ) is reinserted in the file, the consumer reporting agency shall notify the consumer of the reinsertion in writing not later than 5 business days after the reinsertion or, if authorized by the consumer for that purpose, by any other means available to the agency. 

I am keeping phone recordings and paper trail with all communication.

Product: Credit card or prepaid card
Consumer complaint narrative: To Whom It May Concern : This letter is after exhausting all avenues on a current/past situation with Barclay card Frontier credit card. XXXX of XXXX I traveled to Florida for vacation. In order check in my return flight I had to pay with a credit card. I used my XXXX card and paid {$120.00} dollars. When I received my Frontier Barclay Card statement in XX/XX/XXXX, that is when I saw that they auto charged my account for the same amount of {$120.00}. I called Barclay to dispute the charges, sent the statement for my credit card that I used to pay for check in. Called to follow up with Barclay and they said they never received the fax. So I sent it again, this continued for months- with sending the fax statements and being told that they never received the proof. Barclay also advised me to go dispute charges with the other credit card company and I refused that, because I personally paid with that card ( I was not going to dispute something that I paid for ). This continued, within that time I also paid off the balance with Barclay of over {$2000.00} minus the {$120.00} just to close the account and continue to dispute the charges. In XX/XX/XXXX, while this was still going on, I faxed again the statements and Barclay sent a letter to tell me that they received the statements but unfortunately it was past the dispute range and expired. As you can see that I was beyond frustrated- why would I pay a huge lump sum and leave {$120.00} on the account if I owed that. I still call about every 6 months, because now, they put me in collections for {$400.00} and yet I can't even settle that because it has been charged off and they have no way to apply a payment. This has gone way too far on the credit cards part and I feel that proof and faxes were intentionally disappearing or they were giving me the wrong fax number- to where the statements and proof just got dismissed, until they saw that the faxes and the dates of my dispute went out of the range. I would like for this case to be settled and off of my credit report, as it has not only been an emotional mess - when you would be able to see that I have an excellent history of paying bills and not debt with credit cards whatsoever. This whole situation has sabotaged me with lenders and prevented me being able to buy a house with the best credit score I can have if this was not on the report. Please consider reviewing and settling this account in any way to release what is not even my liability.

Product: Debt collection
Consumer complaint narrative: XXXX XXXX XXXX, herein known as " Consumer ''. Convergent Outsourcing IncXXXX are herein known as " third party junk debt buyer ''. On or around XX/XX/XXXX, a Notice was sent to this third party junk debt buyer by way of official first class mail with Notary Certificate of Mailing to show and validate a superior claim that should be rightfully provided to show that they are the true subject creditor pursuant to 28 U.S.C. 2072, 24 OK Stat 24-2, 24OK Stat24-35, and 24 OK Stat 60-178-10. The third party junk debt buyer were demanded to provide me with documentation with respects to either an application for credit, services or employment executed with your entity. The documentation requested should support their ability to obtain my consumer credit report ( 15 USC1681 ( b ) ). There has been no response/performance from the third party junk debt buyer. Silence is acquiescence ; acquiescence is estoppels. STATEMENT OF FACT : I do NOT have an application or contract with the third party junk debt buyer nor can one be produced with a wet ink signature as requested. That fraudulent and false claim of debt is hereby Adjourned. A volunteer, stranger, or intermeddler is " one who thrusts himself into a situation on his own initiative, and not one who becomes a party to a transaction upon the urgent petition of a person who is vitally interested, and whose rights would be sacrificed did he not respond to the importunate appeal. '' Laffranchini, 39 Nev. 48, 153 P. at 252. Parties may be considered volunteers if, in making a payment, they have no interest of their own to protect, they act without any obligation, legal or moral, and they act without being requested to do so by the person liable on the alleged, original obligation. Henningsen v. United States Fidelity Guar.Co., 208 U.S. 404, 411 ( 1908 ) ; Smith v. State Sav. & Loan Ass'n, 175 Cal . App. 3d 1092, 1098,223 Cal. Rptr. 298, 301 ( 1986 ) ; Norfolk & Dedham Fire Ins. Co. v. Aetna Casualty & SuretyCo., 132 Vt. 341, 344, 318 A.2d 659, 661 ( 1974 ).

I have a basic savings account with Citibank. On Saturday, XX/XX/2021, I attempted to log into my account, and kept getting an error message that my password was incorrect ( which it was absolutely the correct password ). I then hit the " forgot password '' to just reset the password, and received a message that online access to my account had been blocked and was prompted to call the customer service line. Over the course of the remainder of that afternoon, I called multiple times, each time either 1. being told that no information could be given to me or 2. being told completely different things every phone call. I was finally told that I would have to wait on a letter to be mailed to me to verify my account. 

It has been almost 2 weeks since I was first denied access to my account, and I have still received no letter in the mail. Each time I call, whether it's to gain access to my account or just attempt to close it and have the funds in my account mailed to me in a check, I am told that nothing can be done until I receive a letter, which is absolutely absurd. On my last phone call with citibank, which was today, the rep came back on the line and told me he simply could not help me, and that he would be terminating the call. He then hung up on me. My money is in this bank account, and i have no way of accessing it, nor closing my account, and Citibank refuses to assist me outside of mentioning a letter, that I have yet to receive after almost 2 weeks.

As of right now, I still have zero access to my account ( online banking ) or the money in it. I am being told to wait on a letter to arrive via USPS mail, that should have been here by now, and is still not here. We are in the middle of a pandemic, and I can not access my account nor can I close it.

Product: Mortgage
Consumer complaint narrative:
SLS Specialized Loan Serving is my mortgage service provider. 

I reached out to them back in XX/XX/XXXX to inform them I was directly effected by the Covid-19. 

They gave me a 6 month forbearance and then I asked for another extension and they gave an additional 3 months which brings my account due for payment XX/XX/XXXX I called to Make my XXXX payment and they mentioned the past balance plus my XXXX payment was due immediately and I explained we are senior citizens on a fixed income and couldnt afford to make that lump payment and asked if the past due balance could be moved to the end of our loan and we were ready to make our one month XX/XX/XXXX payment. 

They mentioned we would need to fill out documentation but to me it looked just like a traditional loan application and we were not told in the beginning that this would be a requirement to get the past amount moved to the end of the loan. 

I asked if we could have another extension that President Biden extended for all people who were effected by the Covid 19 and the rep mentioned they dont know anything about that and he just became President a few weeks ago. 

This is causing more stress on my husband and I we are elderly and we are trying to stay healthy and just want to pay our mortgage and have the balance that we owe put on the end. 

I feel like they arent operating under the Cares Act and need to follow the guidelines Thanks

I would appreciate a timely response outlining the steps that will occur to resolve this matter. If I do not receive a response I will have no choice but to exercise my right under FRCA, Section 616, and pursue legal action. 

-- CLOSED ACCOUNTS 1. XXXX XXXX XXXX with ACCT # XXXX opened on XX/XX/XXXX with a balance of {$590.00} -This is not my account. 

2. XXXX with ACCT # XXXX opened on XX/XX/XXXX with a balance of {$0.00} -This is not my account.

Product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
Consumer complaint narrative:
I have become aware that that the credit reporting agencies may not be in compliance with certain provisions of the Fair Credit Reporting Act XXXX FCRA XXXX and how it is reporting my credit information. 

In accordance of the Fair Credit Reporting Act ( FCRA ) : 605. Requirements relating to information contained in consumer reports [ 15 U.S.C. 1681c ] ( a ) Information excluded from consumer reports. Except as authorized under subsection ( b ) of this section, no consumer reporting agency may make any consumer report containing any of the following items of information : ( 1 ) Cases under title 11 [ United States Code ] or under the Bankruptcy Act that, from the date of entry of the order for relief or the date of adjudication, as the case may be, antedate the report by more than 10 years.

604. Permissible purposes of consumer reports [ 15 U.S.C. 1681b ] ( a ) In general. Subject to subsection ( c ), any consumer reporting agency may furnish a consumer report under the following circumstances and no other : ( 1 ) In response to the order of a court having jurisdiction to issue such an order, or a subpoena issued in connection with proceedings before a Federal grand jury.

( 2 ) In accordance with the written instructions of the consumer to whom it relates.

With subsections 604 and 605, the credit reporting agencies did not get the information of my bankruptcy from the State of Tennessee nor did I express that information to be made public in any expressed written agreement or statement. The three credit reporting agencies received my personal credit information from public records which they are not in compliance with the Fair Credit Reporting Act.

Fair Credit Reporting Act states the regulation and laws that govern the three credit reporting agencies, however the misuse of personal information for financial gain harms consumers. I could not find a place to stay because that was on my credit report and reduce my score. I find it very difficult that I can not find a place to call home in a reasonable area do to the inconvenience of the misuse of my personal credit information.

Product: Mortgage
Consumer complaint narrative:
On XX/XX/XXXX we closed on a refinancing with Eagle Bank for our single family home in XXXX MD. 

On XX/XX/XXXX we were informed that our loan had been sold to US Bank. The effective date of US Bank to start receiving payments was XX/XX/XXXX. Our loan number is XXXX. 

On XX/XX/XXXX I was informed by email that USBank had disbursed {$1900.00} to XXXX XXXX for an insurance premium payout. 

Unfortunately, we do not have our homeowner 's insurance with XXXX XXXX. We have our insurance with XXXX 's and this payment was made by Eagle Bank on XX/XX/XXXX. 

In speaking with the poorly trained customer service department, I was informed that US Bank made a payment for the premium for the Master insurance policy for the Condo.

This property is not a Condominium, it is a single family home which could be easily checked by using XXXX or perhaps just reading the documents. 

Even if this was a condo, what Condo owner pays the premium for the Master Insurance Policy for the Association? The only premium a Condo owner would pay is for an HO6 policy.

The rep then asked me if my policy covered walls in or just the outside. Again, this is a single family home so this question shows a poor understanding of what is in a Condo policy vs a single family home policy. 

The rep found that my paperwork was processed incorrectly designating it as a Condo. Why that happened and what possessed anyone to send a payment for a premium for a Master policy when you aren't even processing my payments yet for the mortgage is unbelievable. 

We are very disturbed that you would send funds out of our account when you do not even have the account till XX/XX/XXXX. 

I spoke with a rep for US Bank on XX/XX/XXXX and was assured my paperwork would be updated and the funds returned to my account. 

On XX/XX/XXXX I received an email that US Bank has now sent another payment for homeowners insurance for {$1900.00} to XXXX XXXX. Still not our homeowners insurance policy. Called the bank on XXXX and they had no record of my request from XX/XX/XXXX. I asked for a lock on any more escor payments and that they had t get my authorization. They refused. I am now out {$3900.00} with no assurances when this money will be returned. I emailed XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX at the Bank with no response. 

US Bank has shown us so far very sloppy handling of our account, our funds and very poorly trained workers. Not what you want to see when you handle our escrow for insurance and taxes.

Product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
Consumer complaint narrative: In XXXX, I contacted M & T Bank to see what options were available so that I would not have my house go into foreclosure. They failed to provide accurate information regarding workout options and foreclosure information. I asked about what options were open for me. They told me that I could not do a loan modification, Deed-in-lieu, Short-sale, or refinance. Different told me different things when I called the M & T Bank Mortgage department so options were told that they were unavailable to me and then they were, or I was too late because of the misinformation. I hired 3 different estate agents who listed the house. I had 2 people who made offers to buy the property for a percentage but, the bank refused saying that it was not enough. one offer was for {$18000.00} and the other was for {$30000.00}. Agents told me that many people didn't put in offers because the garage that is located near the property did not come with the house. So with no acceptable offers, the property went into foreclosure and in XX/XX/XXXX it was sold for {$24000.00}. The mortgage never included the garage located near the property but, as of XX/XX/XXXX, there was a survey completed showing that the garage is actually part of the property. The garage was never insured and only used 1 stall of the garage being that the other stall was used by the owner of other property, and believed to be owned by the owner of other nearby property that shares driveway next to the property. The power is connected to the other property. The garage was never included on the mortgage or appraisal for the mortgage. M & T Bank did not work with me or provide accurate information regarding workout options which have resulted in foreclosure on my credit report and preventing me from getting another home for me and my family.

Product: Debt collection
Consumer complaint narrative: On XX/XX/XXXX, I reviewed my credit and noticed Hunter Warfield was reporting as an outstanding collection account. The same day I mailed a debt validation notice requesting the method or verification. I received no response. On XX/XX/XXXX, I sent a certified mailed letter with a second request for a method of verification. I also requested an original contract with original signatures and if the documents were unable to provide the requested documentation, I requested for the item to be removed from my credit report. As of today, XX/XX/XXXX, I have not received any of the requested information and the debt is still reporting negatively on my credit. Secondly, Hunter Warfield currently does not have a valid business license in the District of Columbia. The District of Columbia requires each entity conducting business in the District to have a General Business License from the D.C. Department of Regulatory Affairs.

Product: Checking or savings account
Consumer complaint narrative: I am contacting this agency for the third time in regard to the same problem, but with complaints about the said resolution of the institute at fault. My original issue was the forgery of my signature and the disbursement of my funds to an unknown and not intended for individual. All I have asked since I was made aware of his problem was documentation from Citibank as to where my funds were deposited. Please refer to complaint ID numbers XXXX and XXXX. The most recent response from the Citibank Executive Response team on XX/XX/21 was 1 ) a lie about my complaint and sending me a copy of the check in question 2. ) giving me a {$50.00} credit for their mistake. I have made it known to them that I have done everything they asked to resolve this issue and still an avoidance of answering where my check was deposited. I have repeatedly advised them that what was at issue here was the theft of my identity. Apparently, to them, my identity is only worth {$50.00}. I believe now that their bill payment system needs to be taken down as their clients can not trust that their money will be sent to who it was intended and they will never be held accountable for it. I have now submitted my complaint to the FTC and will continue moving up the ladder. Unfortunately, as much as government agencies were created to help the average consumer, I have not found that to be true. I'll finish by saying that I too work for the government and I am proud to help serve the residents of my community, after all that is my job and I do it with diligence and respect..

I paid the first payment that was due on XXXX XXXX, 2020, and at that time I set up a recurring automatic payment for all future payments. I am requesting the CFPB to investigate the matter and have the inaccurate reporting notification be removed from my credit report.

Product: Mortgage
Consumer complaint narrative:
On XX/XX/XXXX, Lakeview Loan Servicing LLC made a " Principal Balance Adjustment '' to my mortgage account in the amount of {$8500.00}. This amount appears as a " Deferred Balance '' on my mortgage statements beginning in XX/XX/XXXX. This balance adjustment was made in error, as confirmed by two separate customer service representatives whom I spoke with over the phone on XX/XX/XXXX. At that time, I was assured that the error would be corrected within 2-3 business days. As of XX/XX/XXXX, there has been no resolution and subsequent attempts to contact Lakeview Loan Servicing - both by phone and via their customer support web form - have been ignored. 

Background : From XX/XX/XXXX thru XX/XX/XXXX, my mortgage was on forbearance due to the pandemic. When my forbearance ended on XX/XX/XXXX, I paid the entire 6 month forbearance balance ( {$14000.00} ) in full. According to the customer service representatives that I spoke to on XX/XX/XXXX, Lakeview Loan Servicing LLC mistakenly deferred principal balance from the forbearance period, despite the fact that I had just paid the balance in full. As shown in the attached Payment History, the principal balance adjustment was made the same day on which I ended my forbearance and paid the 6-month balance. 

I have attached a copy of the 12-month payment history for this loan, including mortgage statements. The unexplained/errant Principal Balance Adjustment appears in the XXXX statement as " Deferred Balance '' and appears in the Payment History on XX/XX/XXXX.

Product: Mortgage
Consumer complaint narrative: On Friday, XX/XX/2021 I received a phone call from a home mortgage originator company called ClearPath Lending. His name was XXXX XXXX XXXX, XXXX ID # XXXX. They are the company who did my last refinance on my house. He asked if I'd be interested in doing another refinance into a lower rate. I asked him how much lower would my payment be. He said he didn't have the details in front of him but would go look it up and call me back in a few minutes So, I said OK. A couple minutes after we hung up, I received a series of messages in my email that some company called XXXX XXXX  had just made a hard inquiry on my credit report. I had never heard of them and I got scared I had become a victim of identity theft or something, so I was freaking out! A few minutes later Mr . XXXX called me back. I immediately asked him if he had just run my credit. He said yes. I told him he did not ask my permission first and I never wanted my credit run! He apologized and admitted that he did do it without permission and I told him to fix it. He said I'll get in touch with my manager and see about a gift card for you. I yelled at him, telling him I wasn't interested in his gift cards - I wanted the inquiry removed. He has done nothing to fix it yet.

Product: Debt collection
Consumer complaint narrative: Hi, I have reach-out XXXX XXXX since XXXX. I have sent letters asking to show a contract with them with my wet-ink signature. They refuse to acknowledge. I recently sent an affidavit of notice dispute the debt received on XX/XX/XXXX. Tracking number is XXXX. They did not answer. An Non-respond affidavit in commerce is accept the complaint as true. Receipt of this AFFIDAVIT OF TRUTH & FACT requires a response as stipulated above, acquiescence will be your answer to all below statements if respondents fail or refuse to provide a written response in the form of a rebuttal Affidavit. Acquiescence means A persons tacit or passive acceptance ; implied consent to an act. Review Morris vs. NCR, 44 SW2d 433 which states : An Affidavit if not contested in a timely manner is considered undisputed facts as a matter of law. Also, review U.S. vs. Pruden, 424 F.2d 1021 ( XXXX ) which states : Silence can only be equated with fraud where there is a legal or moral duty to speak or where an inquiry left unanswered would be intentionally misleading. XXXX XXXX did not rebuttal any point-to-point answer with their own affidavit. I also filed a postmaster criminal complaint under title code 18 U.S.C ss 1342 fictitious name and address and title 18 U.S.C. ss 1341 Fraud and swindling. XXXX XXXX only sent a general letter that does not address any of my complaints or any proof of a sign contract. Under the Law, there must be a signed contract for them to collect a debt. WHERE IS THE CONTRACT SIGNED BY ME. SHOW ME THE PROOF? I finally filed a U.C.C. 1 financial statement with the ILLINOIS SECRETARY OF STATE placing a lien on my estate claim the name. I also filed with the ILLINOIS SECRETARY OF STATE COMMON LAW TRADEMARK AND COPY RIGHT NOTICE. The Illinois has accepted the filing and the lien number is XXXX and XXXX. XXXX XXXX will have to a do a U.C.C Lien search to get confirmation. ILL and certified the lien on XXXX time XXXX XXXX.

Product: Debt collection
Consumer complaint narrative:
I received information from you attempting to collect the above-listed alleged debt that you have listed on my 3 credit reports. Your initial communication to me of the alleged-debts was within 30 days ago. Please be further advised, I dispute the validity of the alleged debt in its entirety. Further I request verification of the alleged debt, including, the name and address of the original creditor, along with a copy of a signed contract with the creditor. I disputed this debt with the credit bureaus and it came back verified I have since then contacted the company and haven't received a response. Where are the documents that your company used to verify that you are reporting these accounts accurately? What is the name of the person in your company who verified the accuracy of this account? What documents did they use to verify them? Please provide me with the name of that individual, their company title, and telephone number as well as copies of the documents that they used to verify that this disputed item are being reported accurately. 
You are illegally attempting to collect alleged debt and money that I do not owe. As per the law, cease and desist all collection activity, including credit reporting. This letter may be provided to the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau ( CFPB ). The CFPB is authorized to investigate this matter and receive related information.

Product: Credit card or prepaid card
Consumer complaint narrative:
In late XX/XX/2020, I received emails from Citi with the offer of 5 % cash back on up to {$500.00} of online purchases from the day of enrollment through XX/XX/XXXX XXXX XXXX Monday XXXX. I clicked through the link to enroll three of my Citi credit cards in this offer. 

On each of these cards, I made the following online purchases : Card ending in XXXX .. purchases from XXXX XXXX {$300.00} Card ending in XXXX .. purchases from XXXX totaling {$300.00} Card ending in XXXX .. purchases from XXXX totaling {$500.00} These purchases are all labeled as XXXX in my XXXX, making it clear that they are indeed online purchases that should qualify for the offer. All purchases were within the correct time window. However, I received the following cash back bonuses XXXX XXXX : {$2.00} ; XXXX : {$3.00} ; XXXX : {$5.00} XXXX instead of the correct amounts, which would have been {$15.00}, {$15.00}, and {$25.00}, respectively. In early XXXX, after the incorrect statement bonus amounts posted, I spoke with Citi chat. The representative I spoke with confirmed that my purchases within the correct time and that my cards were enrolled in the offer as described. They stated that they would escalate my issue to customer service, who could resolve my issue. However, I received a letter within a week denying my request. 

Following receipt of this first denial letter, I called Citi customer service in late XXXX to clarify the reason my request was denied. The kind representative I spoke with agreed with my confusion and stated that the credit bonus amount should have been as I have described above. She stated that she would escalate the issue and submit a dispute on my behalf for the additional bonuses to be credited. However, at this point, I have now received a second letter from Citi denying my request for a second time. This is false advertising, as Citi is not fulfilling their offer as promised.

I want to close a checking account that has a {$0.00} balance on it.

Product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
Consumer complaint narrative:
On XX/XX/2020 I purchased a grill online from Lowes to be picked up at their location. After two months of not receiving a notification that the merchandise was ready for pick I decided to cancel the order. I went directly into the store to cancel the order on two different occasions and was told that as long as I didn't pick up the merchandise I would not be charged. I received my statement and I was charged for the grill. I called the creditor, Synchrony Bank and explained what happened and was advised to dispute the balance. I went into their webpage and disputed the balance. 

As of now, the balance still remains and when I called to find out what the resolution is, they said nothing as of yet and would submit a second dispute. Then they proceeded to tell me it would take another 60 days?!

Product: Checking or savings account
Consumer complaint narrative:
Please refer to my previous CFPB complaints about this matter : XXXX and XXXX I had opened a Checking account with BB & T during XX/XX/XXXX or XX/XX/XXXX. I have setup the direct deposit also. I have no idea why BB & T has blocked my online access? As during COVID-19 me and my spouse is working remotely ( from home ) as well as helping the kids during their online schooling. It seems BB & T called and my spouse picked up up the call - but he was in a meeting and I was also in the meeting. I tried to call back BB & T at XXXX but there is so many confusing menus and no way to reach out a human being. Worse thing - during this pandemic - this bank is giving tough time to it's customers - by blocking their online access for no good reasons. Moreover My XXXX payment request is also blocked or stopped. I want full access to my BB & T and freedom to use my account - as end of the this is my money and I need to have the access during this testing times. 
For this I filed a CFPB complaint. Seems to be the case that CFPB is a toothless agency with no powers. CFPB merely forwards the message and do nothing. 
I got the worst possible response from this bank : Neither they will unblock the account nor they will close my bank account and send the balance to me. It seems to me that this BB & T is not a bank but some militia who has their own set of rules. 

Neither they will unblock the account nor they will close my bank account and send the balance to me.

Product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
Consumer complaint narrative:
XXXX XXXX is reporting five ( 13 ) missed or late payments on my credit report ; XX/XX/XXXX - XX/XX/XXXX. I've disputed these late payments with XXXX on multiple occasions including phone, email and certified mail. XXXX has failed to respond to direct disputes and fell short of doing thorough investigations when asked to by the CRAs. Its completely unsatisfactory that these mid to large companies violate FCRA violations such as notices informing consumers they are reporting negative information -- every consumer does not review their credit monthly. In my case, I went nearly a year and half until I noticed the negative reporting by this time there has been instrumental damage to my credit worthiness. What is equally alarming, when the CRAs fail to conduct a independent investigations and the outcomes turn out to be " certified '' without surveilling the full scope. After disputing the reporting, there has been multiple times where XXXX has not left a " dispute remark '' on my profile which I have attached documents validating this incompliance. I've exhausted all options at this point with both XXXX and all three ( 3 ) CRAs to no available. 

Compliance violations 1. 623 ( 5 ) ( a ) -- Duty to Provide Notice of Delinquency of Accounts 2. 623 ( 7 ) ( a ) -- Notice to consumer require reporting Negative information 3. 623 ( 7 ) ( b ) -- Time of notice reporting Negative information 4. 623 ( a ) ( 3 ) : Duty of furnishers to provide notice of dispute to CRAs ( No remark on credit file ) 5. 12 CFR XXXX - Direct disputes Tracking numbers ; XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX

I am in the process of buying a home and the information that is being shown is holding up the process. During the investigation period, the item I am disputing must be removed from my credit report as the mere reporting of items prior to debt validation constitutes collection activity. I am also requesting my name, address, and telephone number updated and remove any other names, addresses, and telephone numbers that do not belong to me. Product: Payday loan, title loan, or personal loan
Consumer complaint narrative: Covid has been really tough and I no longer have an income as well. Our house only gets two monthly checks, once a month from both SS and VA. They are not huge checks at all. My mother got the loan and cashed the check. It's basically one of those companies that send you a real check and they go from there. The company I am talking about is Worth Finance in XXXX, TX. Not only are they calling the house, which they never had the house number, but they found my mother 's cell, which is always off unless we leave the home. She was really confused and it turns out, they admitted that they did an extensive family search to find all of our numbers. I have only given them my cell because my mother doesn't understand when folks use specific wording. Therefore, I handle everything. I get upwards of almost 10 calls a day and several voice messages. It's gotten to the point to where we have no idea what to do.

Product: Mortgage
Consumer complaint narrative:
Lender : LakeView Loan Servicing Company NMLS : # XXXX Lakeview Loan Servicing : XXXX XXXX XXXX, XXXX  XXXX, VA XXXX Problem : After repeated requests for the status of an imminent loan modification ( between XX/XX/XXXX - XX/XX/XXXX over 150 days ), Lakeview Loan Servicing LLC has not provided any electronic or written correspondence regarding the status of my existing mortgage. 

History/Details : I participated in the COVID-19, 90 day mortgage relief program in XXXX of XXXX. Note : The loan was current at the time I opted into the COVID-19 mortgage relief program - My credit score was/is around XXXX - There were no title issues at the time of my opted-in and there were no title or financial concerns between XX/XX/XXXX - through present day ) On XX/XX/XXXX, I verbally agreed and accepted the Lakeview Loan Servicing LLC option to expire the XXXX mortgage relief program. On XX/XX/XXXX, I also agreed that the existing mortgage would be modified to take advantage of the lowered interest rates. 
Lakeview Loan Servicings customer service members informed that paperwork would be sent to me and that the new mortgage terms would start in XX/XX/XXXX. 
Since the XXXX week of XX/XX/XXXX, I have contacted Lakeview Servicings customers service number ( on two weeks intervals ) to inquire about the status of my loan and the imminent loan modification. Each time I called, I was told that while the loan departments are extremely inundated, the mailing of any appropriate loan documentation was imminent. LakeView servicing refused to provide an email or letter form communication providing notification of status or receipt of prior communication. 

As of XX/XX/XXXX, I have not received any correspondence from Lakeview. 
I have incurred over ( {$18000.00} ) XXXX XXXX dollars of additional principle to my loan amount over this period. I am extremely hesitant to send unsolicited payments to the lender in fear that the payments would not be applied correctly or considering their refusal to provide reasonable communications, even acknowledged. 

I am very concerned that Lakeview Servicing is participating in lender misconduct or perhaps fraud. I would like to not only file this complaint, but take advantage of every opportunity available to help bring this to an issue to a close and if possible, protect me from any adverse results that may be incurred do to Lakeviews negligence.

They said they would be working on my behalf to get my total loan amount down. They withdrew {$430.00} from my bank account on 3 separate occasions, in XXXX, XXXX and then lastly in XXXX of 2020. I received a letter from my student loan provider and noticed no payments or progress had been made on my account. Said company Direct Account Management took money from me and did not provide any service to me nor have they done anything with my student loan to help me, but instead just took my money and have disappeared. They have not returned any of my calls and their main contact number is no longer in service.

Product: Debt collection
Consumer complaint narrative:
In XX/XX/XXXX, I moved from XXXX  to XXXX XXXX. I had my XXXX Account on auto-pay for the past four years. I forgot to cancel the account, and reached out to XXXX in XXXX or XX/XX/XXXX to cancel the account. I paid those four extra months and did not even request a refund, understanding that I should have called sooner. 

Once the account was cancelled, it was closed out and my auto-pay was removed. I had asked the agent for written confirmation that the account was closed, but he said he was un able to provide that. There apparently was one more bill erroneously sent to my old address in XXXX, which was then sent to collections. I never received the collections notice because it was not sent to my new address in New York. 

On XX/XX/XXXX, I noticed a delinquent status on my credit report. I could not access it online because the account was closed and I had no record of the number. I called XXXX immediately. The first THREE people I spoke to could not help me. My account was not in their " region. '' They also could not even find my account number because it was closed out. 

Finally, I spoke to XXXX XXXX Employee # XXXX XXXX. He credited the account in full {$160.00} and told me it would take 24 hours to reflect to give notice of hat happened. I was told that the account was inactive and there was " no reason to charge when account was cancelled and de-activated. '' I was also told that it was a " non-collections credit '' and he was unable to send a note or email to me since it was applied manually. It seemed to be a systems limitation. So he gave me his employee number. 

I called Contract Callers twice to resolve this. The account was removed from two of my credit bureau reports, but not XXXX. Then it showed up on an XXXX  report again. Contract Callers told me they were waiting for XXXX to verify this information. It has now been over a month and I have not been able to get this resolved. It is still on my credit report, and I am in the process of signing a commercial lease for my business, so i really need this resolved since this was done completely erroneously.

Product: Debt collection
Consumer complaint narrative: Due to financial hardships, I decided to turn in a car I could no longer afford. The car was returned to the lending company and an agreement made to pay monthly payments in the amount of {$50.00}. A few months into the arrangement, I was asked to increase my payments. I refused because I did not want to agree to a payment I could not afford. Therefore I continued making payments until XX/XX/2019. In XXXX of XXXX the company stop accepting my payments. My online account was disabled and I was told by a collection representative that payments were no longer being accepted and they were pursuing another means of collecting the payment. I tried for several weeks to speak with a supervisor. I was talked to in a very unprofessional manner from several representatives to include the supervisor. I asked for statements and records of my account and was never sent that information. In XXXX I received an email from my HR department notifying me of a garnishment for this account. Days later I received a letter from the company about the garnishment. I attempted to appeal the decision and make several settlement offers but each offer was denied and countered with an amount not much less than the balance this company claim I owed. I've since attempted to offer a settlement but again was countered with an amount not much less than one of the balances this company has reported I owed. The amount the company says I owe is always higher than the amount reported to the credit bureau.

Product: Checking or savings account
Consumer complaint narrative:
I am a stay at home mom, who doesnt work and Bank Of America lied to me and contradicts everything they tell me. 

on XXXX of XXXX I called Bank of America in regards of my account. The representative explained to me he saw some charges on my account. I replied and said I didnt authorize those charges. 

The rep then stated he will submit a refund and within 90 days they will CONTACT THE MERCHANT and after contacting the merchant, they will then make a decision before closing the case. 

On XX/XX/XXXX of XXXX, BANK OF AMERICA reversed the refund which resulted my account being overdraft and they charge me an overdraft fee. ( {$69.00} was the refund ). I then received my stimulus check and because they took back the refund they gave me, my account was in the NEGATIVES and BANK OF AMERICA gave me a credit so My account will be positive again so I can get my full stimulus check. ( if they contacted the merchant and verified the merchant was already paid by my bf, then none of this would of happened ) the temporary credit was for {$43.00} which will end on XX/XX/XXXX ( all of this because no one reached out to the merchant and they caused my account to be in the negatives ) called Bank of America and was told, they NEVER CONTACTED the merchant because there was no urgency. I explained thats NOT what I was told and I was told they would reach out to the merchant before closing the case. 

I was advised that I would now have to submit my documents so they can reopen the case and that it would take up to 45 days I submitted the documents within one week of speaking to the agent. Then was told within 4 business days they would have a decision.

I called back within 5 business days and then was told 10 business days for a decision. I called back again and now was told 45 days again. ( Everyone keeps giving me new days of when this will be resolved ) Now XX/XX/XXXX is close and they will take back the credit of {$43.00} which will make my account go in the NEGATIVES again while they research the claim. For some reason no one can listen to all the calls I made where every agent in the claims department provided different information to me that contradicts what the last person said. And now Bank of America owes me {$69.00} and wants me to pay {$43.00} because of the overdraft fee they caused in my account. 


I was NEVER advised back in XXXX that they needed any documents! No one reached out and explained that I could of faxed them the documents, I only faxed them my documents because the case was reopen since they closed it!

Product: Debt collection
Consumer complaint narrative: On XX/XX/2020 I XXXX XXXX made a phone call to XXXX XXXX XXXX to take care of a debt that I incurred from XXXX XXXX XXXX in the amount of {$850.00}. At the time of speaking with the debt collector they set me up with two separate payments which was requested by me. On XX/XX/2020 I made a payment of {$420.00} and then of XX/XX/2020 I made the second payment via an auto draft from my bank account of {$420.00}. On XX/XX/2020 when I made the first payment I asked the debt collector representative that was taking my payment that once I made the final payment would there be something sent to the creditors on my behalf to remove or delete as that was what I requested and they said yes once the final payment had been received. They also informed me that they will automatically mail me out a letter stating that it had been paid in full. Once I made the final payment on XXXX XXXX and I did not receive anything in mail after a week I called the debt collector and asked them why I had not received anything in mail and thats when they told me that I had toc all and request that. I explained that the last representative that I spoke with did not tell me that I needed to call in however, she stated that it was something that they automatically did. To my surprise I did not get accurate information. Also, to have it removed or deleted the representative told me that it was something that was available upon request which I did request However, only to find out that this has not been removed or deleted from my credit. The last report showed that it was indeed paid in full but also as an active account which is not the truth. According to my research this is a UDAAP violation when there is Deceptive Acts of Practice which was very misleading for me and an very unnecessary process to do the things that I need to do.

Product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
Consumer complaint narrative:
XX/XX/XXXX I returned a XXXX XXXX XXXX as instructed by XXXX. XXXX had performed a preinspection and noted several minor repairs I should have completed before turn-in. I followed their direction and left all the documentation in the car front seat. XXXX still charged me for all the repairs. After several phone calls and multiple resubmissions of the documented receipts and pictures, XXXX finally removed most of the charges. I paid the lease termination fee of {$300.00} and a lost key for {$250.00} but XXXX continued to send me invoices each month. As you can see in the attached XXXX report the balance changed almost monthly for no apparent reason or without any clear itemization. 

Finally, XXXX claimed that the roughly {$390.00} was for personal property tax. Since the State of VA prorates I ask XXXX to send me a statement of the tax record. They didn't send anything other than non-informational monthly statements. recently my credit score took a big hit 100+ points. After investigating I found that XXXX had charged off {$2800.00} dollars. 

I have escalated this to a supervisor who claims there is nothing they can do, I ask the supervisor who would not provide his name or case/claim number. I ask for the supervisor I was speaking with for the 3rd time and he said " she '' would call me. I have received no call. 

I ask XXXX to update the credit bureaus with the status of the account has been paid in full. XXXX agrees it's been paid in full but refuses to report this to the bureaus or have the {$2800.00} charge off. 

This was a 3-year lease. Not a single payment was ever late. 

Hoping you can help me. I have Federal Government clearances and that charge off could prevent me from obtaining future clearances to provide assistance to our Federal clients. I explained the serious nature of this to XXXX they didn't seem to care. Thank you for any help you can provide.
